There are memes of Henry Kissinger: a former US secretary of state, circulating with claims that he made the speech to the World Health Organization Council on Eugenics on February 25, 2009.
Kissinger: s assistant at Kissinger Associates, Courtney Glick, confirmed that the claim is a complete fabrication.
A search of Kissinger: s speeches and interviews from public records and personal archives found no remarks made on February 25, 2009, and there are no media reports of him addressing the topics mentioned in the claim.
